title: How to make a fretless bass sound - Quora

response.answer_text: If you’re talking actually getting a note to sound, out of the bass, you press a string down to the fretboard with a finger on your left hand and then pluck the same string with your right. Of course if you’re left handed the reverse would be done. Then again you would be playing the instrument, in affect upside down because of the way it is strung.
